name: FrontEndWorkflow
description: Front-end workflow (*** Modified for wbn-datepicker ***) for scss-css compilation and js minification

scripts.uglify: uglifyjs scripts/*.js -m -o static/js/wbn-datepicker.js && uglifyjs scripts/*.js -m -c -o static/js/wbn-datepicker.min.js
scripts.build:css: npm run scss && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.build:js: npm run lint && npm run uglify
scripts.uglify:dev: uglifyjs scripts/*.js -o public/js/wbn-datepicker.js && uglifyjs scripts/*.js -c -o public/js/wbn-datepicker.min.js
scripts.build:css:dev: npm run scss:dev && npm run autoprefixer:dev
scripts.build:js:dev: npm run lint && npm run uglify:dev
